tool.name: POS
tool.description: Generates part of speech tags from text or a list of tokens

param.name: input1
param.label: Select a suitable input file from your history

param.name: job_name
param.label: Supply a name for the outputs to remind you what they contain

tool.help: Input is a text or tokenised text. Applies Penn Treebank part-of-speech tags to each token in the text. Output includes the token and POS tag separated by /, eg. big/JJ
